text: Mauro Nespoli is an Italian archer. He was born on 22 November 1987. Nespoli competed at the 2008 Summer Olympics, 2012 Summer Olympics, 2016 Summer Olympics, and 2020 Summer Olympics.Mauro NespoliMauro NESPOLI == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Italian archers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Mauro Nespoli
